meanings.definition: The quality or state of being gory.
meanings.sent1: The gorinesses of the horror movie made me cover my eyes.
meanings.sent2: The gorinesses of the crime scene were too much for the faint-hearted.
meanings.sent3: The gorinesses of the Halloween decorations startled the young children.
meanings.sent4: The gorinesses of the battle were depicted vividly in the painting.
meanings.sent5: The gorinesses of the story left a lasting impression on the audience.

meanings.definition: The presence of blood and violence in a scene or situation.
meanings.sent1: The gorinesses in the movie were intense and realistic.
meanings.sent2: The gorinesses of the video game shocked many players.
meanings.sent3: The gorinesses of the crime scene made the detective's job more challenging.
meanings.sent4: The gorinesses of the war scene were a stark reminder of the harsh reality of battle.
meanings.sent5: The gorinesses of the accident scene were difficult for the witnesses to forget.
